message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll find it a great addition to your collection, but I also want to make sure you know that I have another interested buyer waiting in the wings. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1600000. This is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. What do you say?
